description: Minimal example data bundle for the Actinomycete BGC to Metabolomics mini pipeline.

sources.bgc: Synthetic subset modeled after antiSMASH, DeepBGC, and PRISM outputs (for demonstration only).
sources.ms: Hand-crafted LC-MS/MS feature table with representative columns.
sources.admet: Mock ADMET results to illustrate import functionality.

notes: Data are fictional and intended solely for pipeline demonstration.
